MajorClaims.Text: they have other critical obligations to take, in order to make our society function in an ordered way

Claims.Text: all people who are able to work should pay tax to the government
citizens have other important responsibilities to fulfil apart from paying tax

Premises.Text: it is the most important source of government's revenue, which is mainly used to serve all citizens
a large proportion of the tax is spent on national defence and in maintaining social stability
every one can work and live in a peaceful environment
The tax is also used to pay the salaries of workers working in public service sectors, such as teachers and police officers
these workers do not produce profit directly
what they do is for the well-being of the whole society
there are impoverished or disabled people in every society, needing help and support from others
the government can provide some fund to ease their difficulties
such financial help is usually far from enough
aids from more capable or wealthier citizens are particularly crucial, which are a great complement to government support
Another responsibility all citizens should take is to maintain social stability together with the police force
There are criminals in every society, and the number of policemen the government can hire is limited
it is quite necessary for the local residents to take actions and ensure the safety of the communities, by doing things like reporting suspicious activities to the police department
